about_the_game:
Brews & Bastards is a chaotic 1 to 4 player co-op dungeon crawler with an over-the-top fantasy tavern theme. Pick from a selection of class-based champions, each with their own distinct play styles and abilities, before travelling below the Muneshine Tavern and into a series of brewery themed dungeons that become more difficult and bizarre the further you descend.

Under The Tavern: Deep below the Muneshine Tavern lies an impossibly large brewery, decrepit cellars, machine-filled distilleries and ancient depths that have yet to be discovered. Drunken demon bastards have stolen the Brew Stone, sending the brewery into chaos and randomly altering certain encounters, rooms and rewards each time you descend into the depths.

Bombastic Brews: Your weapons and wits will only take you so far into the pits of the brewery — you'll have to discover, unlock and master a range of magical brews and artifacts that exist deep below. These powerful items alter moment to moment gameplay, from simple throwable flaming cocktails and giant ballistic champagne corks, to the devastating explosive copper mule or bizarre fruit punch fist.

Blasphemous Bastards: Better the bastard you know than the bastard you don't. Select from a cast of dubious heroes, each looking to retrieve the stolen Brew Stone and bring back the unlimited booze it once provided to the Muneshine Tavern. Each champion comes with their own unique style, weapon and set of abilities, that alone makes them strong, but together unstoppable.

Cooperation and Chaos: Pack some drinks and bring some friends. Up to 4 players can join together in couch co-op multiplayer or via Steam remote play, to chug and slay their way across the labyrinths under the tavern. Mix and match your team of heroes to create the ultimate demon-destroying party, and work together to best boozy bosses, each with their own amplified tavern game arena.

content_descriptors.notes: Gameplay and story contains use of alcohol.

short_description: Brews & Bastards is an intoxicating co-op dungeon crawler for 1 to 4 players, overflowing with action-packed combat, magical brews and outlandish bosses. Select from a group of distinct heroes and blast your way through hordes of drunken demons in search of the stolen Brew Stone.
